## runner() function

Client filter runner function.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function runner(filters: ClientFilterSchemas[], container: Container): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  filters | [ClientFilterSchemas](./foundation-filters.clientfilterschemas.md)\[\] | An array of client filters to run. |
|  container | Container | The DI container. |

**Returns:**

boolean

## Remarks

This will return true when all the filters in the array pass.
